name: Desert Student Survivors
description: Adventure into the desert, and try to survive. Desert Survivors is a prototype game from a first time unity user. Move with arrow keys or WASD, whichever you are most comfortable with. You can turn off the the post Processing in the Pause Menu which is accessible by pressing ESC. There is currently just two unlocked maps, and a Huge boss later on if you can survive and upgradable weapons and passives. Good luck with the waves of enemies and have fun in your adventure in the desert.
